elements.text:
HYGIENE 

Over the past week, have you usually been slow or need help with washing, bathing, shaving, brushing teeth, combing your hair or with other personal hygiene?

buttons: 1:: Slight: I am slow, but I do not need help
2:: Mild: I need someone else to help me with some hygiene tasks.
3:: Moderate: I need help for many hygiene tasks.
4:: Severe: I need help for most or all of my hygiene tasks
